entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 34 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 34 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 30.
